version_description:
* Cambridge Advanced Learner's Dictionary Fourth Edition added to the catalogue
* Graphics fully adapted for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
* App launches 3 times faster
* Minor bugs fixed

What’s new for iOS 9 users?
∙ Apple Watch support! Search Cambridge Dictionaries anytime, anywhere with Siri on your Apple Watch. Just activate the dictionary in the Watch app.
∙ Use the Share button to check words! Select any text on Safari sites, in emails and texts, and even on other popular apps, and click Share to highlight words in the dictionary. To activate, just select Cambridge Dictionaries as a sharing 'extension’.
∙ New! Graphics fully adapted for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus.
∙ New multiple clipboard look-up! You can now copy as many words as you need while reading – even the whole text – switch back to the Cambridge app, and view all the relevant dictionary entries one by one.
Improved interface design for your convenience.
If you need help using the app, please contact the developer at support@slovoed.com. For other questions, please contact Cambridge at dictionary@cambridge.org
If you need help using the app, please contact the developer at support@slovoed.com. For other questions, please contact Cambridge at dictionary@cambridge.org
